text:
Now this is something 🤔  President of Tanzania J Magufuli talking about a goat, bird and a Pawpaw  tested positive for Covid19 after samples was sent to the lab under human names without scientists knowing. #lockdownextension
#cyrilramaphosa
#DuduzaneZuma
#day41oflockdown https://t.co/yE5Wp6fcNW
